successStories.title: Use Cases & Success Stories
successStories.description: Discover real-world impact as our immersive solutions transform operations across industries

cards.title: 3D AI Advertisement
cards.description: We scripted and produced a full 3D AI-generated ad with a human avatar and custom voice, delivered end-to-end in just four working days-solving tight budget and timeline constraints for a leading agriculture company in India

cards.title: K buddy AI Learning Companion
cards.description: AI-powered learning companion for the education sector that offers instant explanations, quiz generation, and personalized assessments through a voice/text chatbot, with full deployment completed in three months

cards.title: Outbound Calling Agent
cards.description: An automated outbound calling agent for EdTech sales teams that places voice calls at set intervals, logs every interaction centrally, and gives managers a dashboard for activation and oversight.

cards.title: Sign Language Bot (SignBot)
cards.description: AI tool that converts text into sign language by retrieving and stitching pre-recorded sign clips using SBERT-based semantic similarity and exact phrase matching.

cards.title: Teacher Empowerment System (TES)
cards.description: AI-powered teacher assistant that cuts prep time by up to 50% through syllabus-aligned resource curation, auto-generated quizzes, and smart teaching suggestions-already deployed in 10 schools.
